general_advisory: As there is a chance of occurrence of light to moderate rainfall, farmers are advised to avoid irrigation and spraying operations. High wind speed conditions require support for crops.

advisory: Nursery sowing should be completed by end of 2nd fortnight of July.
Main field land preparation should be done by puddling twice at 7-10 days intervals.
Apply appropriate basal doses of fertilizers based on soil type and variety.
Ideal sowing time is from June 20 to end of July.
For kharif season crop, raised bed planting is advised to avoid waterlogging.
Ensure proper weed control measures at critical growth stages.
Start raised bed nursery preparation for kharif vegetable crops.
Avoid planting and intercultural operations during heavy rainfall periods.
Deworming and vaccination of animals against infectious diseases is crucial.
Ensure safe shelter for animals during rainy season to prevent diseases spread.
